DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate factor affect corneal hysteresis ( CH ) Taiwanese .
DOC.detailed_description: The ocular response analyzer ( ORA , Reichert Ophthalmic Instruments , Buffalo , NY , USA ) measure biomechanical property cornea vivo . It provide several measurement include CH , corneal resistance factor ( CRF ) , corneal-compensated intraocular pressure ( IOPcc ) , Goldmann-correlated intraocular pressure ( IOPg ) . Corneal hysteresis describe viscous damp due viscoelastic resistance cornea deformation pulse air jet tonometer . Whereas CH may reflect corneal viscosity , CRF may relate elastic property cornea . Both parameter measure ORA use dynamic bidirectional process . CH affect various ocular disorder operation . In previous study , CH find significantly low keratoconus , Fuchs ' dystrophy , glaucoma . After laser situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) phacoemulsification , CH permanently temporally decrease . Among normal population , CH also variable associated several factor : age , gender , intraocular pressure , central corneal thickness , corneal curvature . High myopic patient long axial length find low CH normal subject . CH also affect race , CH largely discuss Caucasian population . Herein study normal population CH associate factor Taiwan . We plan conduct retrospective study January July , 2009 Department Ophthalmology , Far Eastern Memorial Hospital , Taipei , Taiwan chart review . We enroll patient bilateral cataract , unilateral cataract healthy fellow eye , ocular pathology , prior ocular surgery , previous trauma . Several ocular parameter demographic un-operated eye patient measure . CRF , IOPcc , IOPg , CH measure ORA . Central corneal thickness measure use ORA 's integrated handheld ultrasonic pachymeter . The IOLMaster ( Carl Zeiss , Jena , German ) use obtain ocular biometry include axial length , anterior chamber depth , keratometry . Linear regression model use test correlation CH quantitative factor . The chi-square test use find significance correlation categorical value . One two eye patient undergoes uneventful phacoemulsification in-the-bag implantation posterior chamber intraocular lens ( one-piece AcrySof , Alcon lab , Texas , USA ) one surgeon ( Wang JK ) . The sutureless corneal wound 2.75 mm long . CRF , IOPcc , IOPg , CH measure ORA preoperatively 1 day , 1 week , 2 week , 3 week , 1 month , 2 month , 3 month postoperatively . Paired test use compare change parameter follow operation . We expect factor correlate CH , axial length , IOP , age , central corneal thickness . Temporary reduction CH possibly shortly phacoemulsification , return baseline follow period time .
DOC.criteria: normal population ocular disease except cataract , prior ocular operation , prior ocular trauma
